mapper.sql: id, is_delete, update_user_portrait, gmt_create, gmt_modified, user_name, alarm_content, global_trace_id, original_time, match_rule_id, start_time, db_instance, ms_table_name
mapper.select: select user_name from ms_alarm_information group by user_name

select count(*) as counts from (select user_name as userName,match_rule_id as matchRuleId from ms_alarm_information where update_user_portrait = 0 and is_delete = 0 group by user_name,match_rule_id) as a;

select user_name as userName,match_rule_id as matchRuleId, max(original_time) as original_time, count(id) as matchCount from ms_alarm_information where update_user_portrait = 0 and is_delete = 0 group by user_name,match_rule_id order by user_name,count(id) desc
LIMIT #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into ms_alarm_information ( user_name, alarm_content, global_trace_id, original_time, match_rule_id, start_time, db_instance, ms_table_name ) values
( #{item.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.globalTraceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.originalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.matchRuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.dbInstance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.msTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update ms_alarm_information
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
update_user_portrait = #{updateUserPortrait,jdbcType=TINYINT},
match_rule_id = #{matchRuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
original_time = #{originalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_content = #{alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
global_trace_id = #{globalTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
db_instance = #{dbInstance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ms_table_name = #{msTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
